description:
Komari is going crazy as Natsumi forces her to dress up as a robot for her summer research project. Hotaru also plans to work on her own project today, since she`s at home alone for the day. Her project combines a talking robot with a walking robot. She uses her dad`s computer to input the lines her robot will say and places the necessary mechanisms for both robots in one of her Koma-plushies, which she then places on a stuffed dog. Then she moves to the more spacious living room to test it out, and when she flips the switch...
Source: crunchyroll
